full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA DANG 'BREL BAR RIGS GSUM MGON PO'I BZLAS BRJOD BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS GTER CHEN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MKHAR SNGON CHOS SKYABS TI YAN CHI'I SPRUL SKU DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DANG, AOR DU SU HANG PE ZI'I SHOG LHAG BSAM DGE BA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG DPAL BZANG GNYIS KYIS BSKUL NGOR` ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RAM PA RATNA A'ANANTA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
